content: first 2 sts single_crochet 5 skip last 2 sts 5 r2 ch1 turn increase single_crochet 3 increase 7 r3 ch1 turn increase single_crochet 5 increase 9 r4 ch1 turn single_crochet across 9 r5 ch1 turn decrease single_crochet 5 decrease 7 r6 ch1 turn decrease single_crochet 3 decrease 5 fasten_off legs step 1 insert hook into edge of underside the corner before where the head begins step 2 chain 10 single_crochet back down the chain starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch back into where you made the first chain step 3 slip_stitch to next leg place i made 3 st sts placing a leg around every other blo row and repeat step 2 repeat steps 2 and 3 around the underside until you have 12 legs in total assembly sew underside to the wrong side of the shell you want the clean ridges from blo row showing being sure to leave the single_crochet row around the edge free so it hangs over the underside leave a small gap for stuffing then finish sewing closed woollendesigns 2023 i hope you enjoyed this pattern and love your new creature i d love to see your creations so feel free to tag me in anything you make @woollendesigns on instagram here are some more photos of my own creature creations this pattern is intended for personal use only no part of this pattern may be shared altered resold or distributed feel free to sell finished creations crediting woollendesigns as the original pattern designer woollendesigns 2023
